subject: We got your DreamStone order!
body:
Hello %userFirstname%, we love what you chose!

Here are your order details:
Customer name: %userFirstname% %userLastname%
Shipping address: %orderAddress%, %orderCity%, %orderState%, %orderZip%, %corderCountry%
Email: %orderEmail%
Phone: %orderPhoneNumber%

Order: %diamonds%
%products%
%composites%
Coupon: %coupon%
Bank Discount: %bankDiscount%
Payment Method: %paymentMethod%
Total: $%amount%
Tax: %tax%
You can view the status of your order anytime by logging into your account.

When will my item arrive?

At DreamStone we hand make everything from start to finish right in our own facilities in NYC. This process typically takes 2-3 weeks. If you need it sooner , just let us know and we will try to work with your timeline.

Should you need any assistance, one of our representatives are can be reached at 800-818-8386 or you can email us anytime at service@dreamstone.com

Questions? Contact us at 800-818-8386 or you can email us anytime at service@dreamstone.com

subject: Diamond Book Form
body:
We look forward to seeing you! Your appointment request details are below:
%location%
Name: %name%

Surname: %surname%

Email: %email%

Phone: %phoneCode%-%phoneNumber%

Date: %calendar% at %hour%: %minutes% %twentyFourHours%

Additional request: %text%

Booking for: %pageFrom%

What are the next steps?

One of our representatives will contact you to confirm your appointment date and time. We'll also call you to discuss any additional options to make sure we're prepared with the right items so that you're productive in your meeting with us.

subject: Diamond Match Form
body:
We received your price match request below:

Name: %name%
Email: %email%
Text: %text%
Page from: %pageFromMatch%

One of our gemologists will review your request and will contact you through email to let you know if we can price match or beat the price in the source you provided above. Please note that price matches are for GIA or IGI certified diamonds only. The diamond must be displayed as in-stock and available for sale at a competitor's website. The diamond must be the exact same diamond with the same certificate number. If the diamond has sold or we are unable to price match, we'll send you alternative options for you to review.

Feel free to reach out to us at anytime at service@dreamstone.com with any additional questions.

DreamStone | Diamond Search | Engagement Rings
